thread.title: Best Place to Stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Best Place to Stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: arthuang0725
title: Best Place to Stay in Paris
text: Please read my review on Eugene en ville's website as I have left a somewhat lengthy one there. The bottomline is, it's really the best hotel to stay in where you are in Paris. The staff, the room, the location, etc. I know you will be pleasantly surprised as I was. It's my second stay there in my two trips to Paris in two years. I am deeply grateful for the experience.
